subtitleNullable: A Dataset Of The Servants in Fate/Grand Order Mobile Game
descriptionNullable: ### Context This dataset contains information on 309 servants from Fate/Grand Order mobile game. The information contained in this dataset includes stats, class, stars, artists and etc. The information was scraped from the [fandom wiki page](https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/Fate/Grand_Order_Wikia) of the game. ### Content - id: The servant ID. - name: The name of the servant. - japanese_name: The japanese name of the servant. - aka: Also known as. - class: The class of the servant. - stars: The servant tier. - gender: The gender of the servant. - strength: The strength stats of the servant. - endurance: The endurance stats of the servant. - agility: The agility of the servant. - mana: The mana stats of the servant. - luck: The luck stats of the servant. - np: The Noble Phantasm stats of the servant. - cost: The cost to add the servant to the party. - min_attack: The servant minimum attack. - max_attack: The servant maximum attack. - min_hp: The servant minimum HP. - max_hp: The servant maximum HP. - grail_hp: The servant maximum HP with Holy Grail. - grail_atk: The servant maximum attack with Holy Grail. - voice_actor: The voice actor of the servant. - illustrator: The illustrator of the servant. - attribute: The innate attribute of the servant. - growth_curve: The type of curve for level up the servant. - star_absorption: How many critical stars the servant gets when the stars are distributed. - star_generation: How many critical stars the servant generates when attacking. - np_charge_atk: How much the NP gauge is increased by when attacking enemies. - np_charge_def: How much the NP gauge is increased by when being attacked. - death_rate: Chance of the servant being killed by the instant-kill effect. - alignments: The alignment of the servant. - traits: Traits for specific active skills, noble phantasms (NP), biography, passive skills, and events. - cards: The command cards of the servant, where Q is quick, A is arts and B is buster. ### Acknowledgements This dataset is only possible because of [Fandom Page of Fate/Grand Order](https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/Fate/Grand_Order_Wikia) and its amazing amount of information. I would like to thank the fans for the amount of information collected in the game and for publishing on the Fandom Page. All data were collected from [Fate/Grand Order fandom page](https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/Fate/Grand_Order_Wikia). ### Inspiration I have been a fan of Fate Universe for so long with the games, animes, and movies. In 2017 was launched the mobile game by Aniplex in the USA. This motivated me to test my web scraping skills to make this dataset.
title: Fate/Grand Order Servants
subtitle: A Dataset Of The Servants in Fate/Grand Order Mobile Game
